<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81643</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81643</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4624</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">People in Business/Enterprise Questions</string>
            <string language="es">La gente en los negocios /Preguntas sobre las empresas</string>
            <string language="ga">Daoine i nGnó/Ceisteanna Fiontraíochta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leute in den Business/Enterprise Fragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gens dans des questions de Business/Enterprise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Povos em perguntas de Business/Enterprise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gente in domande di Business/Enterprise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωποι στις ερωτήσεις επιχειρήσεων/επιχείρησης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Several questions with sample answers relating to the topics of Enterprise and People in Business. Other solutions are also possible.  </string>
            <string language="es">Varias preguntas con respuestas de muestra relativas a los temas de empresas y la gente en los negocios. También son posibles otras soluciones.  </string>
            <string language="ga">Roinnt ceisteanna le fragraí samplacha maidir le topaicí na Fiontraíochta agus Daoine i nGnó. Tá freagraí eile féideartha freisin.  </string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
            <string language="es">Empresariales. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einige Fragen mit den Beispielantworten in bezug 
auf sind die Themen des Unternehmens und der Leute im Geschäft. 
Andere Lösungen sind auch möglich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plusieurs questions avec des réponses 
d'échantillon concernant les sujets de l'entreprise et des personnes 
dans les affaires. D'autres solutions sont également possibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diversas perguntas com amostra respondem a 
relacionar-se aos tópicos da empresa e dos povos no negócio. 
Outras soluções são também possíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parecchie domande con le risposte del campione 
concernenti i soggetti di impresa e della gente nel commercio. 
Altre soluzioni sono egualmente possibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάφορες ερωτήσεις με τις απαντήσεις δειγμάτων 
σχετικά με τα θέματα της επιχείρησης και των ανθρώπων στην 
επιχείρηση. Αλλες λύσεις είναι επίσης δυνατές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
